body.name: AOSU Solar Camera Outdoor Wireless - 100% Wire-Free Outdoor Security Camera Wireless with Fixed Solar Panel,360° Panoramic View, Human Auto Tracking, 2K Color Night Vision
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 9 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 3 hrs 9 mins
features: Simple installation - App voice guidance to connect the camera, complete and detailed manual can ensure you complete all steps quickly. Don't be bothered by complicated wires, you can quickly install your security camera with fixed solar panel at any time. Installed once for permanent use.

360-Degree Coverage & 2K Crisp Image - This solar security camera with Panoramic PTZ can rotate to wherever you tap on the 360-degree panorama, allowing you to quickly check every corner and ensure full protection for your home.Features in upgraded real 2K resolution to capture crisp details day and night.

Automatic Human Tracking - When human motion is detected, the solar security cameras wireless outdoor automatically focuses on and tracks the moving people to record a more detailed event. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that your property is under great surveillance.

Forever Power - 100% wireless free. Daily direct sunlight is enough to power the AOSU wireless camera continuously, so you never have to change the battery regularly. Solar powered security cameras utilize sunlight to recharge their batteries, focusing on an environmentally friendly and energy-saving concept.Put it on the wall, then you could start 365 days surveillance.（Note: 2.4GHz WiFi ONLY）

Warranty & After Sale Service - AOSU is dedicated to provide you with the best quality outdoor solar camera with latest tech. More surprise to explore: compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant/ IP65 Weatherproof/ Smart Alerts/ 2 ways for storage.We offer lifetime technical support with local phone service, 1-year warranty.

Work Smarter Do more with your aosu security cameras and connect it to Alexa or Google Assistant to help create a smarter, secure home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Setup was easy despite what some say. Video quality very good. The follow me feature works great. What I really like is that unlike some cameras with follow me this camera does a good job of following and if one walks past and takes the camera far away where one normally has it aimed - this camera shortly returns to the position one had it in to start. I like this as I don't care who comes out of my yard but I want to see who would walk past and go into my yard. Returning to my original position means it will catch someone coming from the most likely position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A GREAT CHOICE !
reviews.reviewText: Subject: Stellar Camera Recommendation – Unmatched Quality and Outstanding Customer Service!Dear AOSUI hope this message finds you well. I wanted to take a moment to share my recent experience with a fantastic purchase I made on Amazon.com – a set of cameras that have truly exceeded my expectations.After some thorough research, I stumbled upon a brand that not only provides exceptional image quality but also boasts a hassle-free setup. What's even more remarkable is that these cameras are battery-free, thanks to their innovative solar technology.Setting up these cameras was an absolute breeze – user-friendly and efficient. The results? Simply stunning! The image and video quality far surpassed my expectations, capturing every detail with clarity and precision. I'm thoroughly impressed with the performance of these cameras.Moreover, I encountered a minor hiccup with one of the cameras that arrived with a defect. However, the customer service from the company was nothing short of exemplary. I reached out to them, and within two days, a replacement camera was at my doorstep – no questions asked. The swift and hassle-free resolution showcased their commitment to customer satisfaction.In a market flooded with choices, finding a product that not only delivers on its promises but also comes with outstanding customer support is truly a gem. I highly recommend these cameras to anyone in search of a reliable, high-quality surveillance solution.Best regards, James D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I own some WYZE cams and they’re out of stock so I bought this on a whim. After 24 hours I am duly impressed. I like the fact that the panel on this particular model was integrated with the camera. Although the other style is probably just as good. Anyhow, so far, very good and happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Customer support, Nice Camera
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased camera, had a problem with solar charging, and customer service, Julie, worked with me to remedy the problem. Camera works perfect, easy to set up, and use. If you have a problem with camera, don't hesitate to reach out to customer service, unlike many, this customer service is there to help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for rural areas! App is 5 stars!
reviews.reviewText: I bought 4 cameras to install in a small ranch in Brazil - it was very simple to install and has worked incredibly well. The app is amazing, the camera works online and offline (I installed 128GB SD cards in each of them), the quality of the product and of the video/audio is incredible. Everything works better than I expected!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Update.So we purchased this product again because it was just that fabulous. It was going well and then suddenly it stopped charging itself with the solar panel.I reached out to customer service and worked with Julie.Let me pause for a second to give props to Julie who went above and beyond in assisting and offering suggestions on what the issue might be. She determined the product was faulty and sent a new one that arrived a day sooner than she originally said. Now I'm not saying she has super powers with shipping but I wouldn't be surprised if she did. Shout out to Julie.So far everything appears to be working great again, and if you have a problem, please reach out to them first. Again I want to comment on the quality of the camera and how clear the picture is, because my RING camera could never.This makes 2 cameras I have by this company in use, with the other set I have being given to a friend. I'm excited for her to experience the excitement I have with these cameras.**********This is our second camera by this company and I couldn't be more pleased at the quality. Will definitely be buying another one soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product with high hopes. I wanted to mount it above my garage outside. I did not want a camera that required wires. We have had trouble near our house and I hoped this would help. It was so easy to install and setup! All I had to do is get and insert a memory card (SD) although that is only needed if you need or want to record contacts. It has worked perfectly! I would highly recommend purchasing this camera and will likely by another for the back of my property!

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great ,easier to setup than my other Aosu cams . uses Bluetooth now.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install.( my 4rth camera from Aosu )It's just 1 thing to mount if you're lucky and have sun exposure at the mounting point.3 screws and a click and its mounted *PTZ works very well in the app.still has an option for local micro SD for video storage ( in the camera, use a fast type of SD or it will be slow to review. )seems to charge even in this low-light Canadian winter.Floodlights are good.If you need the app lets you pick an alarm or lights or both.It will track human-like shapes moving in its view if you want. (it's kind of creepy but also handy when I walk out in the lot to the truck or shed. it will follow me.My wife can use it to call for me if I'm in the shed or working on the truck.Cons:* easy to mount, just click on the mount. I have lots of wind here on the ocean, so i put a heavy zip tie around the mount just to be sure.you can't change the solar aim, so you have to be lucky with the sun's direction. ( they sell one where the solar is a separate mount.you do need ok WiFi Charging, so far even in the grey wintery light of eastern Newfoundland, it has maintained itself at 99% charge.I am thinking of buying one that has a detached solar for the other side of the house. it has a fixed-position Aosu solar cam that is well into its 2nd year now. I have to say the PTZ is nice .

Le qualità salienti, dopo tre giorni di funzionamento :-APP molto semplice ed intuitiva-Ottima definizione delle immagini di giorno anche con giornata nuvolosa-Visione notturna veramente definita-Basso consumo (dopo la nottata la percentuale di batteria era al 95%. Di giorno si è ricaricata in meno di un'ora. Era una giornata nuvolosa e di pioggia)-Estetica molto carina.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this camera as I have the door bell camera and have been very impressed by it.After installing it I had a few issues so on the app I decided to contact online support. Not expecting a reply I was amazed after a hour a response from a lady (Julie) she went up and beyond to resolve my issues.Would definitely recommend this company and product.

Très bonne caméra Très facile à installé simple d utilisation fait très bien sont travaille ont ce sens vraiment en sécurité j en est pris aussi pour mes parents et beau parents service client au top jamais vu un service client aussi réactif une caméra remplacé je recommande vivement c était marqué

Ich habe diese Kamera im Garten im Einsatz. Leider zeigte sie nach einiger Zeit an das sie nicht mehr geladen werden kann. Daraufhin habe ich den Support kontaktiert, wo mich eine sehr freundliche Mitarbeiterin beraten hat. Hier möchte ich mich auch nochmals für die Hilfe und die freundliche Unterhaltung bedanken. Kurzum mir wurde ohne Probleme weitergeholfen und das Problem behoben.Zur Kamera kann ich nur sage sie macht, was sie soll, sehr gut finde ich auch die Panoramaansicht sowie die gute WLAN-Verbindung.Ich kann diese Kamera nur weiterempfehlen.
